div.aria-label: girl with glasses writing at classroom desk

div.p: TAUSD values community and fosters a culture of continuous improvement.

div.aria-label: Two THS Cheerleaders holding up tournament shirts

div.p: Our goals are reflected in the Local Control Accountability Plan with an emphasis on: 1) STUDENT ACHIEVEMENT: * Special education and disengaged students * Transition to high school * Career Technical Education * K-12 digital literacy 2) SCHOOL CLIMATE: * Relationships with Trinity County Office of Education and other local agencies * Student and staff ethics * Communication with all stakeholders
